entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
